ValidationRule.description: Requires Funding Account Confirmed & Payroll Schedule Confirmed before entering date for Kotapay Doc Created
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( ( ISBLANK( Funding_Account_Confirmed__c ) = TRUE) || ( ISBLANK( Payroll_Schedule_Confirmed__c ) = TRUE) ) && ( ISBLANK( Kotapay_Doc_Created__c ) = FALSE) && RecordType.Name != "Single(k) Plus Plan"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please confirm both "Funding Account Confirmed" and "Payroll Schedule Confirmed" dates before entering date for Kotapay Doc Created.
